data.product_name: UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool - As Seen on Shark Tank - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat - Tool for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (1 Pack, Gray & White)

summary.topics: carseat, stroller, seat, harness, toddler, granddaughter, unbuckle, baby, grandchild, daughter, car, handy, buckle, vehicle, gadget, worked, purse, grandkids, child, button, grandmother, grandma, work, thumb, grandson, bought, easier, son, mom, ordered, fit, lock, helpful, best, row, thanks, thank, done, help, better, tried, purchased, awesome, her, crotch, and push

durable.review: Works well for people with arthritis and weak thumbs
Has saved me from ruining my manicures!!!

easy.review: Makes my life easier, especially when my nails are longer than usual.
This thing is pretty awesome. I love it. I have long nails and could not get my son out of his car seat, this is quick and easy. I attached it to his car seat for even more convenience.
I will return this one did seem as easy to use and a little flimsy not sure if it would break over time.  The grip on the area you press is nice but not enough
I have RA.And this si so easy to get my granddaughter out of her carseat.Works perfect. I LOVE LOVE IT
Very easy my 80 year old grandmother had no issue
Bought so my 4yr old can get himself out of his seat since I have a newborn now. Very easy to use!
Makes it easy to release children
So easy to use. Save my nails too.
Easy to use, easy to store. Works as advertised
Does what its supposed to! No trouble at all

quality.review: I love this! Makes unbuckling car seats (2) so much quicker !

I waiting to post a review until we had a full few weeks of using this.  I bought this so we dont have to hold up the drive through lane as my small 5 yr old is still in a 5 point harness. Reaching back to push the button  was killing my shoulder. So I  should him this and he can actually not unbuckle himself. He loves using it and proud he can let himself out now. I will be referring this to all my friends that still have  children harnessed to speed up the drop off line.

I just got this and tried it for the reason that the grandma made it I have arthritis in my thumb and have a daycare so I got one so I get get my little ones out of the car seat.  Thanks so much great idea and I love it.

Perfect little gadget if you like to get your nails done regularly and don't want to snap them off. It's also just easier in general to unbuckle car seats with. Even when I don't have my nails done I sometimes struggle with the red button depending on our car seats.

I'm so happy I bought this! My thumbs don't work like most people's. They bend at the joint too easily, and it made it very, very difficult for me to unbuckle my grandkids. With this tool, I can unbuckle them so much easier. I keep it in the drink holder in the car door, so it's always available when I need it. Thanks for inventing this! I love it!
Best thing to unhook baby out of car seat... must have for every Grandma that transport a baby! Nails are saved too..
I bought this for my mom to help with my daughter getting her in and out of the car seat this is exactly what we needed
Fantastic idea and works beautifully!!!have gotten some for friends,too.
Love love love this product, it makes unbuckling my son's seat a breeze
Must buy! I have long nails , and this completely saved me! I attached to my car keys. Works effortlessly! I recommend this product! Great add on for a baby shower gift!

I was able to easily get the lower lock open once i worked the gadget under the lock, but have not been able to get the chest lock open. The first one i ordered from another company did not work at all, so this is an improvement. i will keep trying to get the other to work.
This is the best thing I ever purchased. I was never able to open my grandchildrens car seat and struggled every day. Thanks for inventing this.
Works like a charm. Wish you'd invent a tool for the big button you have to push to release the harness
I like it but it feels too bulky and then I wish it had a little key chain or rope to hang it off my keys, diaper bag or car seat. But it does the job.
What a fantastic idea, no more broken nails and no more struggling to get the buckle undone, genius product
I wish it had a clip so I could put it on my Purse
I am also a Grandma with thumb arthritis (both hands). Makes a huge difference releasing the car seat button. Thinking about getting a second one: one for my purse and one for the car! Great value!
Bought for my 4 year old so he could sit in the third row of my van without me having to climb back and unbuckle him every trip. He got the hang of it super quickly and it's been a lifesaver.

I have arthritis in my hands and my thumbs do not work.  This product saved me a lot of frustration.  I can now easily take my granddaughter in my car and buckle and unbuckle her with great ease.  Thank you for inventing this thing.
I have little hands and long nails - so this invention is a great help! Love that it is mom invented too - support those mompreneurs!!

This is wonderful!  Makes getting my grandchild out of the car seat easy.  No more fumbling with the release buckle and not being able to press it well enough to get it to release, this buckle release works wonders!  Everyone needs one or two.

I love this! My 5 year old son sits in the 3rd row of our vehicle and its super difficult to reach back there to unbuckle the crotch buckle of his seat... hes not quite strong enough to get the buckle undone on his own. Hes able to use the unbuckle me and unbuckle himself now. Highly recommend.
Perfect! Works exactly as expected. Even works to hook your keys onto the belly bar on a stroller for baby to play with keys lol!

After neck surgery, my thumbs are weakened. This was a life saver for me as I struggle to apply enough pressure to unbuckle. It is slightly awkward to slide the tool in, but once in place it pops right open.

This product works great. I bought it for my 5 year old daughter to unlock her seat, as shes not in a booster yet. It is also helpful for me as the button hurts my wrist to open it myself which I have to do from the front seat since she is in the middle of the back seat. I have recommended this to my mom too, who struggles with getting the seats unlocked.
Bought this so my 6yo can unbuckle herself in the 3rd row so I don't have to climb over seats in the drop off line! Great tool and easy to use.

I bought this hoping it would help my 5 year old be able to unbuckle himself. We have a 3rd coming and my oldest is about to move to the 3rd row so I need him to be able to do it himself so I dont have to climb back there every time. The first try he got it!!! I am so thankful for this little piece of plastic.

I got this for my 4 year old who is in a Graco wayz. He could undo his own chest clip but not his crotch buckle. This helps him ALOT but hes still getting the hang of it. I keep this on my keychain and only give it to him when he needs it, and he gives it back when hes done. Love this!
Awesome for moms that want nails now I feel so much better
It is the best devices on the market.
I didnt get a chance to use it with that safe distancing, but I will let you know how easy it is to use Im hoping to find out soon !
Works perfectly! So easy to use.
Saw this on shark tank and knew I needed it. I couldnt open my granddaughters car seat no matter how hard I tried. Great product
Very easy to use, glad I found this!
Worked great to unbuckle our grandchild highchair.  Struggled before due to arthritis in thumb area.  Grandchild thought it was pretty funny too!!!
It definitely helps if you have nails. I wish there were something to help with the buckle part as well. Its bigger than what I expected.

This product is awesome. I have been having trouble with some pain in hands lately so I decided to buy it for my granddaughters car seat and it works perfectly. I would highly recommend it if you are having trouble when pushing the button.
Love it!

I ordered this as a result of seeing on Shark Tank....The few times I attempted to release my great grandson from his car seat I always had problems and would just stand back and let my daughter or granddaughter release it.  I have not had the opportunity to actually use it yet but it's in my purse and ready for use.  I'm sure it's going to work for me.  Thank you!
Worked well as I have trouble with strength in my thumbs.  Wasn't as easy as I thought getting it under the buckle. I could have loosened the strap a bit. All in all, still very happy with it.
Exactly what I needed , I got this because I have acrylic nails and cant get her out of the car seat with them , but now I can ;) I keep it in my purse and can use it so easily! Highly recommended
Absolutely love!!! Having acrylic nails this is a must!!
This works great!  It makes it so much easier to unbuckle the car seat!
Little hard to get to fit on buckle but once I used it a few timas it got better.

I have arthritis in my hand and have had some joints replaced, making it impossible to unfasten the car seat belt for my grandson!  This little gadget works like a charm!  Just the right thickness to slip between my little man and the buckle clip!  What a great invention!
Eh, it was ok. I figured it would be a little easier to use.

This is a great device. I think it would be very helpful for someone with long or acrylic nails or someone with arthritis. However we bought it for our child to use to be able to unbuckle himself from the third row of a vehicle. It is hard for him to get it lined up just perfect and usually only does one side of the clip. Not very helpful for us just yet but we are still working with him.

Perfect for Mamas with nails! I usually dont get my nails done but its been a pamper thing I do for myself lately, & getting the kids out of their car seats has been a struggle without this! Sometimes its hard to get on right away but it does its job!!
Like
Perfect for us mommies with long nails
Wish I had  bought this two years ago.  Works great!
Love this thing!! My nails have been breaking like crazy here lately and this helps so much!

Best help ever! As retired paramedic and great-grandmother, I worried about not being able to quickly remove my 2 year old great-grandson from his car seat in an emergency. Read the directions, worked perfectly first time I used it. Now his mother wants one so she doesn't break her nails. THANK YOU DEVELOPER!!
I absolutely love this!!!! My kid (4 yrs old) can get unbuckled all by herself. It really helps out! I can do other things and she is happy and confident because she can do it by herself!!!
Awesome little invention.. my daughter couldnt get out of her car seat because of bottom button but now it takes her only seconds and she is so proud of herself
Wish I had found it sooner.  Works incredi, saves my manicure, and nails. Excellent
Love this. Very easy to use and helps me preserve my nails that tend to break off when I'm trying to unbuckle my little ones.
Works great, easy to use and store
This is the best tool ever!
Works great!
I'm so grateful for the car seat buckle release tool.  Now I'm able to get my grandchildren out of their carseats without excrutiating pain from arthritic thumbs.  It works great, super simple.

carseat.review: This little devise makes a huge difference in my life when Im trying to get my granddaughters out of their car seats!  As with the inventor, I, also, am a grandma with thumb arthritis.

I initially thought it was a great concept considering I like having longer nails. Its not for me. It turns out its more of a struggle for me to get out the Unbuckleme, even with it being attached to my keys. Also, you have to aim a certain way and center it just right so that it will unlock the car seat. It takes more time than just doing it the other or fashion way.

This has been a life changer for me. Thanks to this product I can easily unbuckle my grandsons car seat without pain in my thumbs. My arthritis had prevented me from being able to travel with him by myself, but now I can do so with no problems.
Can't believe something so small solved my problem with car seats!  Wish I had thought of this!

My 5 year old loves the independence this tool provides.  Before he had to wait until someone would "spring" him from his carseat.  Now he can unlatch himself.  This has eliminated so many tears and made us all happier.
It works great on a car seat.  I purchased hoping it would work on a stroller but it didnt.

Love love love Unbuckle Me! I was having to wear my thumbnail short so I would be able to unbuckle my grandkids car seats. No more! This handy new tool is the perfect answer! Great answer to this Mimis problem!!
I like the idea, but the buckle release is fairly low on my car seat and it is hard to get the release tool under it.

seat.review: Does not work with my Nuna Pipa with the cushion. It makes it more complicated and more time consuming.
This did not work at all for me, very awkward and slips off the button very easily

toddler.review: As someone with a form of muscular dystrophy,  getting my 2-year-old out of his car seat was a real struggle due to my hand weakness. I got my Unbuckle Me this afternoon and tried it right away and it worked perfectly! Would definitely recommend. So excited I found this!

It's nearly impossible to get the clip between the chubby little things of my 3 month old. The picture of the product shows an older child so maybe it will get easier to use as my child grows... I hope!  The way I'm able to use it now is to loosen the straps all the way in order to fit the clip in.
Great for grandma to help toddler out of carseat.

I have rheumatoid arthritis and have trouble with hand strength. This makes getting my toddler out of the car seat so much faster and easier! No more struggling with those clunky car seat buckles! I would highly recommend this to anyone who struggles to get those car seat buckles open.

review_types.best_review: Love love love Unbuckle Me! I was having to wear my thumbnail short so I would be able to unbuckle my grandkids car seats. No more! This handy new tool is the perfect answer! Great answer to this Mimis problem!!
review_types.worst_review: Perfect for Mamas with nails! I usually dont get my nails done but its been a pamper thing I do for myself lately, & getting the kids out of their car seats has been a struggle without this! Sometimes its hard to get on right away but it does its job!!
review_types.neutral: Does not work with my Nuna Pipa with the cushion. It makes it more complicated and more time consuming.
